text: Tense rule: Present Simple = subject + base verb. (I eat, He eats)
Article rule: Use 'An' before vowel sound. (an apple, an hour)
Spoken tip: Use short sentences to speak confidently.
Prepositions: 'in' for months, 'on' for days, 'at' for time.
Idioms: 'Break the ice' = start a conversation.
